DOC.criteria: Adults age 30 70 year . 10year CAD Risk < 10 % Elevated blood LDL cholesterol range 3.0 5.0 mmol/L [ equivalent 117195 mg/dl ] . elevate TG level [ 1.5/L 4.0mmol/L , 134 mg/dl 356 mg/dl ] . Adults age less 30 , 70 year age Adults 10year CAD risk > 10 % Individuals preexist disease illness include : heart disease , diabetes , renal disease cancer Individuals take CYP3A4 inhibitor [ include cyclosporine danazol ] . Individuals take Statin medication , include : Atorvastatin [ brand name : Lipitor® , Caduet® ] Fluvastatin [ brand name : Lescol® , Lescol® XL ] Lovastatin [ brand name : Advicor ® , Altocor ® , Altoprev ® , Mevacor ® ] Pravastatin [ brand name : Pravachol® , Pravigard® PAC ] Rosuvastatin [ brand name : Crestor® ] Simvastatin [ brand name : Vytorin® , Zocor ® ] Individuals allergy fish and/or fish oil , Vitamin E , red yeast rice , coenzyme Q10 , soybean oil ingredient investigational product [ i.e . capsule constituent ] Individuals anticipate , plan surgery course trial Individuals take natural health product , particularly contain vitamin K , high level vitamin E Coenzyme Q10 [ individual 4week washout NHPs permit ] Individuals consume fish oil another type omega3 fatty acid supplement onemonth priorto and/or course study Women pregnant breastfeeding Individuals history migraine Individuals take blood thinning , blood pressure medication Individuals diagnose statininduced muscle damage ( myopathy )
